name: Noctambulism
description:
Just like in classic cartoons, guide a hapless sleepwalker through an increasingly hazardous construction site with point-and-click elements and jump timing. Be careful... the higher you go, the deeper the dream gets!

Noctambulism is a three-month midterm project by Full Sail University student team deepNOTdeep. 

We are:

Sean Davis (Fridurmus@gmail.com | Github | LinkedIn)
